title: People

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

hair_colors.description: A comma-seperated string of common hair colors for this species, none if this species does not typically have hair.

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.

average_height.description: The average height of this person in centimeters.

average_lifespane.description: The average lifespan of this species in years.

eye_colors.description: A comma-seperated string of common eye colors for this species, none if this species does not typically have eyes.

homeworld.description: The URL of a planet resource, a planet that this species originates from.

skin_colors.description: A comma-seperated string of common skin colors for this species, none if this species does not typically have skin.

url.description: The hypermedia URL of this resource.

films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this species has appeared in.

description: A species within the Star Wars universe
